name: bat
actor_no_arg: You bat your long, dark lashes and smile innocently.
others_no_arg: $n bats $s long, dark lashes and smiles innocently.
actor_found_target: You bat your eyelashes at $N and smile innocently.
target_found: $n bats $s eyelashes at you, acting innocent.
others_auto: $n tries to bat $s eyelashes at himself, but after several moments realizes $e can't.
